## Usage

```js
<<<<<<< Updated upstream
var isBinaryPath = require('is-binary-path');

isBinaryPath('src/unicorn.png');
//=> true

isBinaryPath('src/unicorn.txt');
=======
const isBinaryPath = require('is-binary-path');

isBinaryPath('source/unicorn.png');
//=> true

isBinaryPath('source/unicorn.txt');
>>>>>>> Stashed changes
//=> false
```
